verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Josaphat \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* grew \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* numbers \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Josaphat, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* trusted \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* Baalim,

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* according \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sins \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Josaphat: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* acquired \w immense|strong="H7230"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w courage|strong="H3820"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* groves \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* Benhail, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Abdias, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Zacharias, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Nathanael, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Micheas, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Juda:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* them \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, Semeias, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Nathanias, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Zabadias, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Asael, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Semiramoth, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Adonias, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Tobias, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Thobadonias \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* them Elisama, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, having \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* instructed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* durst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* make war \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Josaphat.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Josaphat, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4503"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Arabians \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* cattle, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* many \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w goats|strong="H8495"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* Josaphat \w grew|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* exceeding great: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* Juda houses \w like|strong="H1961"\w* towers, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* walled \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* prepared \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w works|strong="H4399"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Juda: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1004"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* number \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w families|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* every \w one|strong="H1368"\w*: \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Juda \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, Ednas \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3076"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w eighty|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* Amasias \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zechri, consecrated \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w After|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w was|strong="H2428"\w* \w Eliada|strong="H0450"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H1368"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w two|strong="H4480"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* also \w was|strong="H3027"\w* Jozabad, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w eighty|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* ready \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, beside \w others|strong="H0428"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* walled \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda.
